user.title: Create notifier
user.description: Set a friendly service name for your composite notifier.

add_target.title: Add target

add_condition_entity.title: Condition — entity
add_condition_entity.description: Choose the entity to check for this target.

add_condition_value.title: Condition — value
add_condition_value.description: Pick the operator and value for the condition.

remove_condition.title: Remove conditions
remove_condition.description: Select one or more conditions to remove.

match_mode.title: Condition match mode
match_mode.description: Should ALL conditions match, or ANY?

order_targets.title: Order targets
order_targets.description: Set the priority order (top is tried first).

choose_fallback.title: Fallback service
choose_fallback.description:
Choose a fallback notify service.

Available: {available_services}

select_target_to_remove.title: Remove targets
select_target_to_remove.description: Select one or more targets to remove.

error.must_be_notify: Please select a valid notify service.
